data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Pointe Noire, Republic of Congo need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pointe Noire, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Pointe Noire, Republic of Congo to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 104,276 believers in Pointe Noire to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 104,276 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab people.
Father, you gave the church of Pointe Noire, Republic of Congo the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 715,300 souls in Pointe Noire and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Pointe Noire to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Pointe Noire
location.people_groups_list: Pygmy, Bayaka, South Asian, general, Hausa, Arab, Mbosi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pygmy, Bayaka (41,000), South Asian, general (190,000), Hausa (11,000), Arab (1,200), Mbosi (557,000)
